name: sales query report
query:
SELECT 
S.service_group as "Service Group:Data:200",
S.service as "Service:Data:200",
CA.doctor_name as "Doctor:Data:200",
SUM(grand_total) as "Grand Total:Currency:150",
SI.status as "status:Data:150",
SUM(SI.outstanding_amount) as "Outstanding Amount:Currency:170",
COUNT(grand_total) as "Count:Data:100"
FROM  `tabSales Invoice` as SI
INNER JOIN `tabClient Appointment CT` CA
ON (SI.appointment = CA.NAME)
INNER JOIN `tabServices` as  S
ON(CA.service = S.NAME)
WHERE 
(SI.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s)
AND (CA.physician = %(doctor)s OR %(doctor)s = "all")
AND (CA.service = %(service)s OR %(service)s = "all")
AND (SI.status = %(status)s OR %(status)s = 'all')
AND (S.service_group = %(service_group)s OR %(service_group)s = "all")
GROUP BY S.service_group, S.service, SI.status, CA.doctor_name
ORDER BY S.service_group DESC,S.service DESC, CA.doctor_name,SI.status DESC
